channel.title: Hiring free coder~
channel.description:
I have some problems from a server I just started hosting, I have hosted several times but lost all my files due to a harddrive fry.
Right now I'm looking to nerf the exp rating and the drops ( if my code didn't work )
Basing on your skills and experience I'm thinking about hiring a coder for my rsps. If I see that the coder I hire is good at editing, ect.
1. Must be able to use mic 2. Must be over 15 3. Must actually know what your doing
Thanks guys, Pandaz~

item.title: Hiring free coder~
item.dc:creator: @l2mage_kids l2mage kids
item.description:
@l2mage_kids wrote:

I’d be glad to help you code your server, i’m currently 16 turning 17 soon and i have a mic and am able to use it. Yes, i know how to code. What revision are you using and source?

Add me on skype if you want to speak further: L2Mage.Kids

Read full topic

item.title: Hiring free coder~
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“kidgoku4522, post:6, topic:516640”][quote author=xPandaz link=topic=634901.msg4284455#msg4284455 date=1366151962]
I have some problems from a server I just started hosting, I have hosted several times but lost all my files due to a harddrive fry.

Right now I’m looking to nerf the exp rating and the drops ( if my code didn’t work )

Basing on your skills and experience I’m thinking about hiring a coder for my rsps.
If I see that the coder I hire is good at editing, ect.

  1. Must be able to use mic
  2. Must be over 15
  3. Must actually know what your doing

Thanks guys, Pandaz~
[/quote]
it don’t matter about age
The 2 best PI coders on here are 11 and 12 So there goes your must be over 15[/quote]
I hope you fucking spontaneously combust on your sleep tonight.

Read full topic

The 2 best PI coders on here are 11 and 12 So there goes your must be over 15[/quote]I have to disagree with that assumption even though I know that at least one of them you are referring to does know at least a good portion of the files even though I never personally worked with him.

item.title: Hiring free coder~
item.dc:creator: @kidgoku4522 kidgoku4522
item.description:
@kidgoku4522 wrote:

[quote=“xPandaz, post:7, topic:516640”][quote author=kidgoku4522 link=topic=634901.msg4284751#msg4284751 date=1366199905]

I have some problems from a server I just started hosting, I have hosted several times but lost all my files due to a harddrive fry.

Right now I’m looking to nerf the exp rating and the drops ( if my code didn’t work )

Basing on your skills and experience I’m thinking about hiring a coder for my rsps.
If I see that the coder I hire is good at editing, ect.

  1. Must be able to use mic
  2. Must be over 15
  3. Must actually know what your doing

Thanks guys, Pandaz~

it don’t matter about age
The 2 best PI coders on here are 11 and 12 So there goes your must be over 15
[/quote]

Eh well if I could get someone of that standard it would be nice, but the only reason I say that age is because most people under 15 are rather immature.
And I don’t see why you commented, if someone wants to code for me and they know what their doing they would more than likely tell me " i want the position but i’m under 15, or something. Let’s not try and be a forum jerk.[/quote]
I was just making the point that Age does not matter all the time thats all i was not trying to be a jerk lmao

Read full topic

Thanks
